summary: This document contains the Articles of Incorporation for Maple, Inc., a corporation established in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It outlines the corporation's purpose, structure, and the names of its initial directors and officers, including Jeffrey Epstein. The document also includes various tax reports and financial statements for the corporation over several years.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the President and Director of Maple, Inc., involved in the corporation's management.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is mentioned as the Treasurer and Director of Maple, Inc., serving until a successor is elected.

events.title: Incorporation of Maple, Inc.
events.description: Maple, Inc. was officially incorporated in the U.S. Virgin Islands.

events.title: Certification of Incorporation
events.description: The Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands certified the incorporation of Maple, Inc.

keyFacts: Maple, Inc. was incorporated on November 22, 2011.
Jeffrey E. Epstein serves as the President and Director of Maple, Inc.
The corporation's primary business is holding property for personal use.
The corporation has a total of 10,000 shares of common stock authorized.
The financial statements indicate a history of net losses for the corporation.
